name: Sharegate
overview:
Sharegate Inc. is an Austin, Texas-based private company founded in early 2009. Our mission is to introduce modern communication methods into public corporation stakeholder interaction.

Our goal is to develop a large and robust information exchange platform that will connect individual and institutional investors, publicly-traded corporations, and affiliate members within a transparent forum.

Sharegate uses both proprietary and pre-existing software to combine the best attributes of social networking websites with a communication system that is powerful and comprehensive, yet simple and intuitive to use.

Our website gathers streaming news reports, individual account holdings from leading brokerages, institutional holdings data from SEC filings, and fundamental data from corporate filings. This centralized information system, combined with interactive and dynamic software tools, allows transparent communication and collaboration among individual investors, corporations, institutional investors, and affiliate organizations.

Sharegate is a powerful online communication platform that changes the way shareholders and corporations interact.
